author: WSJ Staff
title: Brexit & Beyond: U.S., France and Britain Unite Around Syria Strike Plans, ECB Worries About Trade and Euro, Goldman Chief Says Brexit Proving Less Drastic Than Expected
text:
Brexit & Beyond: Europe in Flux is The Wall Street Journal’s round-up of news and analysis of how Brexit will affect global business, economies and finance. You can sign up here.
